c74object.name: o.abs
c74object.description: Similar to max's 'abs', but can also process lists.

method.name: int
method.description: The absolute (non-negative) value of the input is sent out the output.

method.name: float
method.description: float input will always have a float output.

method.name: maxsize
method.description: Set the maximum list length for o.abs. This is the equivalent to sending the maxsize message to the object, but allows the list length to be changed dynamically. The default list length is 256. This is similar to zl objects. If an input list is bigger then the maxsize then all items above the maxsize will be ignored.

attribute.name: maxsize
attribute.description: Set the maximum list length for o.abs. This is the equivalent to sending the maxsize message to the object, but allows the list length to be changed dynamically. The default list length is 256. This is similar to zl objects. If an input list is bigger then the maxsize then all items above the maxsize will be ignored.

entry.name: int
entry.description: The absolute value of the input if it is an int.

entry.name: float
entry.description: The absolute value of the input if it is a float.

entry.name: list
entry.description: The absolute values of the input if it is a list.
